statements: SELECT * FROM sales_data ORDER BY transaction_id DESC;
SELECT product_name, sale_amount FROM sales_data WHERE sale_amount > 100;
SELECT transaction_id, product_name FROM sales_data WHERE sale_date = '2022-01-15';
SELECT product_name, sale_amount FROM sales_data WHERE transaction_id IN (101, 102, 103);
SELECT AVG(sale_amount) as avg_sale_amount FROM sales_data;
SELECT * FROM sales_data ORDER BY sale_date DESC, sale_amount ASC LIMIT 10
SELECT product_name, SUM(sale_amount) AS total_sales FROM sales_data GROUP BY product_name ORDER BY total_sales DESC
SELECT product_name, sale_amount FROM sales_data WHERE sale_amount > 100 ORDER BY sale_amount DESC
SELECT DISTINCT product_name FROM sales_data ORDER BY product_name ASC
SELECT transaction_id, product_name, sale_date FROM sales_data WHERE sale_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY sale_date ASC
SELECT * FROM sales_data;
SELECT product_name, unit_price FROM sales_data WHERE quantity > 10 ORDER BY unit_price DESC;
SELECT customer_name, email, phone_number FROM customer_data;
SELECT * FROM sales_data WHERE sales_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT product_name, quantity, unit_price*quantity AS total_price FROM sales_data;
SELECT product_name, unit_price, quantity FROM sales_data;
SELECT * FROM customer_data WHERE customer_id = 100;
SELECT customer_name, email, address FROM customer_data WHERE email LIKE '%@gmail.com';
SELECT product_name, unit_price, quantity, sales_date FROM sales_data WHERE quantity > 10 ORDER BY sales_date DESC;
SELECT customer_name, phone_number, address FROM customer_data WHERE address LIKE '%Street%' ORDER BY customer_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM SalesData;
SELECT product_name, sale_amount FROM SalesData WHERE sale_date = '2023-01-01';
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM Customers ORDER BY customer_name ASC;
SELECT region_name FROM Regions WHERE region_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT * FROM SalesData WHERE sale_amount > 1000 ORDER BY sale_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM SalesData ORDER BY sale_date DESC;
SELECT product_name, sale_amount FROM SalesData WHERE sale_amount > 1000 ORDER BY sale_amount ASC;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM Customers WHERE customer_name LIKE 'A%' OR customer_name LIKE 'J%' ORDER BY customer_name;
SELECT customer_name, customer_phone FROM Customers JOIN Regions ON Customers.customer_id = Regions.region_id WHERE region_name = 'North';
SELECT * FROM SalesData JOIN Customers ON SalesData.sales_id = Customers.customer_id ORDER BY sale_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM sales_data
SELECT product_name, unit_price, total_price FROM sales_data WHERE order_date = '2022-01-15'
SELECT order_id, product_name, quantity FROM sales_data ORDER BY order_date DESC
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE phone_number LIKE '%555%'
SELECT product_name, category, unit_price FROM products WHERE in_stock = TRUE
SELECT * FROM sales_data ORDER BY total_price DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT product_name, quantity, unit_price FROM sales_data WHERE unit_price > 50 ORDER BY quantity DESC
SELECT customer_name, email, phone_number, address FROM customers WHERE customer_id IN (1, 3, 5)
SELECT product_name, category, unit_price, in_stock FROM products WHERE last_updated >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY product_id ASC

SELECT orders.order_id, customers.customer_name, products.product_name, orders.quantity, orders.order_date FROM orders JOIN customers ON orders.customer_id = customers.customer_id JOIN products ON orders.product_id = products.product_id WHERE orders.order_date BETWEEN '2022-06-01' AND '2022-06-30'
SELECT * FROM sales_data ORDER BY sale_date DESC;
SELECT product_name, sale_amount FROM sales_data WHERE sale_amount > 1000;
SELECT customer_name, email, phone FROM customers WHERE customer_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT product_name, category, price FROM products WHERE price < 50 ORDER BY category ASC;
SELECT employee_name, department FROM employees WHERE hire_date > '2022-01-01' AND department = 'Sales';
SELECT * FROM sales_data WHERE sale_amount > 1000
SELECT product_name, sale_amount FROM sales_data WHERE sale_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY sale_amount DESC
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE phone LIKE '%555%' ORDER BY customer_name ASC
SELECT * FROM products WHERE category = 'Electronics' AND price < 500 ORDER BY product_name
SELECT employee_name, department FROM employees WHERE hire_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30'
